name: Scrap the Bots
description:
>> Overview
Scrap the Bots is an angry birds like done in 2 days for a school-organized game jam ! 

Play as Elbert, a rugged scrapper fighting off against robot invaders with absolutely everything he can find in his junkyard. 

>> Controls
Hold LMB to charge shot
Release LMB to throw
Press D to attach dynamite to an object, press again to blow it up whenever

>> Credits 
Developer : Thomas 
Game Designers : Nicolas, Jean
Game Artists : Philémon,  Alexis, Raphaelle

>>Important Details
The format is currently glitched ! Please enable fullscreen to be able to play the game
